name: Bomb Defuse (Michael Carstairs)
description:
A game created for the TriJam# 82 Delay. 

This is a small puzzle casual game so half the fun is working it out so not telling you how to play. 

Simple idea disarm the bomb before time runs out. 

If you want to work it out without and help look away now

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Hint - you need to cut the wires to disarm the bomb but be careful one wrong cut and its game over.
